venue.address_1: at the intersection of Charles St and Boylston St
venue.name: Boston Common - Charles Street side

item.description:
Three monstrous years of Boston Frisbee, and we haven't even skipped a beat. When money was tough for many in 2009, BF was a great place to forget about our pains without having to stress about spending money to have fun. When 2010 was giving us the cold and wet blues, we fought back with hot chocolate and camaraderie at Boston Coffee Company. Now the summer approaches fast, and what better way to kick it off than with our annual Boston Frisbee birthday bash!

Like our 2 year anniversary party, we will be bringing some cool action-packed, quirky and suspenseful games and shenanigans! And unlike our 2 year party, we're going to change it up a bit so we can bring something new and exciting for you to munch on - just like our mascot, Huck the Magic Dragon.

Here's what's in store:

  • Pick-up games (of course!)
  • Mini-frisbee games - Frisbee baseball, Water Balloon point and more
  • Socials such as, the human-knot and the game of Wah
  • Cake!


Note the new summer start time of 8:30pm

Interestingly enough, we'll be playing on Boston Common this year around and chances are the baseball field lights will be on. If we spill over the allotment of 50 people (we had 55 last year), then we will use the fields near Beacon Hill as well. Please please please RSVP for us so we can figure out how much we will need in terms of supplies and what not.

Bring your camera too. We'll bring ours so we won't forget what an awesome night we will have!

See ya there

Sincerely, all the Organizers!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us playing on the softball field
item.name: 3yr Boston Frisbee Birthday Bash!
